comment.author: 57415363@N02
comment._content: The boxes have  solid head (end) were made by had or by a box machine. The triangle shaped vertical end piece tie the head, side and end together using box nails. The conveyer belt corner is interesting. The box may be pushe around the corner by the 'next' box on the belt. these boxes are being received, they are going into the warehouse from the field. The full boxes on the cart have the top layer turned at a 90 degree angle to the stack. I never saw this done or boxes that were sized allowing this. The truck in the background is easy to miss.
